com.risk.controller

Class GamePlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.controller.GamePlayController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/gamePlay")
public class GamePlayController
extends java.lang.Object
    GamePlay Controller is a part of MVC Controller which handle the actions and events on GUI side.According to risk game, this controller allows to initialize the startup phase (each phases) and render game play webpage to players.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Loveshant Grewal
